product_overview: A multilingual e-commerce frontend starter built with React, Vite and TypeScript providing browsing, cart/checkout, user account management and CMS blog features with a consistent axios client and Zustand state stores.
core_goals: Provide a performant, accessible, and localized storefront (Arabic/English with RTL/LTR support).
Enable standard e-commerce flows: browse products, add to cart, checkout, and manage orders/addresses.
Offer developer-friendly structure: single axiosClient, clear folder layout, and reusable Zustand stores.
Support user authentication via phone + OTP, favorites, notifications, and profile management.
Keep routes and API usage consistent and resilient to errors (standardized error handling).

features.name: Home Page
features.description: Main landing page with hero slider, banners, categories, special offers, bestsellers, testimonials and partner logos.
user_flows: Navigate to /ar -> See hero slider with auto-play -> Browse product categories -> Click a product card -> Navigate to /ar/singleproduct/:id -> See product details
Navigate to /ar -> See loading placeholders -> API GET /api/v1/home-page fails -> See error toast/notification and retry option

features.name: User Login (Phone + OTP)
features.description: Authenticate users by entering phone number and verifying via OTP code.
user_flows: Navigate to /ar/login -> Enter phone number -> Click Login button -> Receive OTP input -> Enter valid OTP -> See successful authentication and redirect to /ar/profile
Navigate to /ar/login -> Enter phone number -> Click Login button -> Receive OTP input -> Enter invalid OTP -> See error message 'Invalid code' and remain on OTP input

features.name: User Registration
features.description: Register a new account using name, phone and other details with OTP verification.
user_flows: Navigate to /ar/register -> Fill name and phone and required registration fields -> Click Register button -> Receive OTP input -> Enter valid OTP -> See account created and redirect to /ar/profile
Navigate to /ar/register -> Fill form with invalid phone format -> Click Register button -> See inline validation error and prevent submission

features.name: Product Browsing
features.description: Browse and discover products via categories, brand pages, search, offers and product detail pages.
user_flows: Navigate to /ar/offers -> Browse offers list -> Filter by category/brand/price -> Click a product -> Navigate to /ar/singleproduct/:id -> See product details and Add to cart button
Navigate to /ar/search -> Enter search query -> Click Search -> Receive zero results -> See 'No results' message and suggested categories

features.name: Shopping Cart
features.description: Add items to cart, view summary, update quantities and remove items before checkout.
user_flows: Navigate to /ar/singleproduct/:id -> Click Add to cart -> See cart summary update in header/store -> Navigate to /ar/checkout -> See added items and quantities
Navigate to /ar/singleproduct/:id -> Click Add to cart -> Network POST /api/v1/cart fails -> See error toast and item not added to cart

features.name: Checkout
features.description: Complete purchases by selecting address, payment method, applying coupons and placing orders (auth required).
user_flows: Navigate to /ar/checkout -> Select delivery address -> Choose payment method -> Apply valid coupon code -> Review order summary -> Click Place order -> POST /api/v1/orders succeeds -> See order confirmation
Navigate to /ar/checkout -> Select delivery address -> Choose payment method -> Apply invalid coupon code -> See coupon error message and total not updated

features.name: User Profile
features.description: View and edit authenticated user's profile information and preferences.
user_flows: Navigate to /ar/profile -> See profile info loaded from GET /api/v1/profile -> Edit name/email/phone -> Click Save -> PUT /api/v1/profile succeeds -> See success toast and updated profile
Navigate to /ar/profile -> Edit phone with invalid format -> Click Save -> See inline validation error and request not sent

features.name: Orders Management
features.description: View order history, inspect order details and cancel eligible orders (auth required).
user_flows: Navigate to /ar/myorder -> See list of orders from GET /api/v1/orders -> Click an order -> See order details -> Click Cancel Order -> PUT /api/v1/orders/:id/cancel succeeds -> See updated order state
Navigate to /ar/myorder -> Click Cancel Order on non-cancelable order -> See error message and order remains unchanged

features.name: Favorites / Wishlist
features.description: Save and manage favorite products for later reference.
user_flows: Navigate to /ar/singleproduct/:id -> Click favorite (heart) toggle -> POST /api/v1/favorites/toggle returns favorited -> Navigate to /ar/favourite -> See product in favorites list
Navigate to /ar/singleproduct/:id -> Click favorite toggle -> Network request fails -> See error toast and favorite state reverts

features.name: Address Management
features.description: Add, edit and remove delivery addresses used during checkout (auth required).
user_flows: Navigate to /ar/address -> Click Add new address -> Navigate to /ar/singleaddress -> Fill address form -> Click Save -> POST /api/v1/locations succeeds -> See new address in /ar/address list
Navigate to /ar/address -> Click Edit on an address -> Navigate to /ar/singleaddress -> Submit with missing required field -> See inline validation error and prevent save

features.name: Notifications
features.description: Present notifications to the user and allow marking/read/clearing actions (auth required).
user_flows: Navigate to /ar/notifications -> See list loaded from GET /api/v1/notifications -> Click a notification -> POST /api/v1/notifications/:id/read -> See notification marked read
Navigate to /ar/notifications -> Click Clear all -> DELETE /api/v1/notifications/clear-all fails -> See error toast and notifications remain

features.name: Language Switching
features.description: Switch site language between Arabic and English and update URL and layout direction accordingly.
user_flows: Navigate to /ar -> Click language toggle in header -> URL changes to /en -> Layout switches to LTR and translations update
Navigate to /ar -> Click language toggle -> If translation resources fail to load -> See fallback language text and user notified

features.name: Blog
features.description: Browse blog listings and read individual posts.
user_flows: Navigate to /ar/blog -> See list of posts loaded from GET /api/v1/blogs -> Click a post -> Navigate to /ar/blog/:slug -> See full blog post content
Navigate to /ar/blog/:slug -> GET /api/v1/blogs returns 404 -> See 'Post not found' message and link back to /ar/blog

features.name: Developer Setup & Local Dev
features.description: Repository setup instructions, single axiosClient usage and local dev server workflow.
user_flows: Clone repository -> Run npm install -> Create .env with VITE_API_URL -> Run npm run dev -> See dev server at http://localhost:5173
Clone repository -> Run npm install -> Forget to create .env -> Run npm run dev -> App tries to call API with default or missing base URL -> See network errors and console warnings
